channel.title: Black ops new maps!
channel.description:
NEW ZOMBIES: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Nxjn-q80UU4
NEW MULTIPLAYER MAPS: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OMEeqWBWjv8&feature=related
Might get me to play again.

item.title: Black ops new maps!
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I thought about the automatic turrets as well, I thought that would of been stupid. Unless there is some kind of switch to turn them off. I kind find someone on Search and Destroy attempting to go around with the turrets.

Read full topic

item.title: Black ops new maps!
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Chassy13:

Not even that excited right now. I know for sure I am looking at reviews before I buy these maps. The trailer didn’t even entertain me because I know I am not to be fooled after immediately buying all of MW2’s maps.

Those were horrible, but I loved the zombie maps on WaW, except shino, but this new one looks awesome.

Read full topic

item.title: Black ops new maps!
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I still get plenty of entertainment from the maps that were already released with the game.

A zipline that is going to be camped on 24/7 isn’t really my motivator.

The map with the 2 snow bridges interested me for a second, until I realized the same thing as above. The whole match is going to be an across the map firefight/grenade fight while others grenade the bridge the entire time.

Automatic turrets are retarded considering while playing search those things will go off and give away your position completely.

Honestly I stopped watching the trailer before the last one, so no feedback on that until I get bored and watch it.

Read full topic

item.title: Black ops new maps!
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Chassy13:

Not even that excited right now. I know for sure I am looking at reviews before I buy these maps. The trailer didn’t even entertain me because I know I am not to be fooled after immediately buying all of MW2’s maps.

That is kind of true, I was fooled after I bought the Modern Warefare maps. All of them turned out too be horrible. SIGH I will look at the reviews before obtaining them.

Read full topic

[/quote]
